titles.title: Recognizing the need for Compton Community College to receive an expedited accreditation process.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
5/9/2014--Introduced. Recognizes the excellence of Compton Community College, located in Compton, California.
Expresses support for its faculty and students.
Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that Compton Community College should receive an expedited accreditation process.
